title: [知識分享] Cacti升級到1.x.x後出現的Error

replies.msg:
# After upgrade your Cacti to 1.x.x , you'll got this error:

ERROR: Your Cacti database login account does not have access to the MySQL TimeZone database. Please provide the Cacti database account "select" access to the "time_zone_name" table in the "mysql" database, and populate MySQL's TimeZone information before proceeding.





# Solution 解決方法

# Login to mysql database as root 以root身份登入mysql

mysql> use mysql;
GRANT SELECT ON mysql.time_zone_name TO cacti@localhost IDENTIFIED BY 'Your_Cacti_Password';

FLUSH privileges;

quit


# Import timezone data 匯入timezone資料
[root@monitor01 ~]# mysql_tzinfo_to_sql /usr/share/zoneinfo | mysql -u root -p mysql


# Restart mysqld services 重啟mysqld服務
[root@monitor01 ~]# service mysqld restart
仲有, 更新之後, 有些plug-in可能會唔支援, 你要再裝過新版本D既plug-in.
